title.rendered: DAZN will broadcast a free linear channel within the platform

content.rendered:
In recent years, we have seen a huge boom in streaming platforms. We no longer only have options to find the best movies or series, but we also have some options to watch sports. Here we cannot ignore DAZN, a perfect platform to watch the best football with the Premier League or important broadcasts of other sports, such as the Moto GP World Cup. from today extreme sports lovers have one more reason to subscribe to DAZNand is due to the arrival of a linear channel.

As we say, the sports offer that DAZN handles is quite important. The platform offers us live events of all kinds of sports, not just the majority ones. Its offer includes events such as darts tournaments, billiards and even some athletics events. Thanks to the agreement signed between DAZN and Red Bull Media House, from today May 4, we will have access to the first linear channel offered by the platformwhich is none other than Red BullTV.

The best extreme sport comes to DAZN

This deal is great news for subscribers to the platform, who will be able to enjoy everything Red Bull TV has to offer at no additional cost. The arrival of this channel on DAZN occurs simultaneously to more than 200 countries and territoriesthus bringing the best extreme sport closer to a large number of spectators.

Among all the content included in this channel, we can highlight the total coverage of the Crankworx World Tour (competition focused on Mountain Bikes), as well as the Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series and of Drift Masters European Championship. In addition to covering these events, the channel’s broadcast also includes a good number of documentaries, series and programs produced by the channel itself, such as «Driving Dirty: The Road to Baja” either “Red Bull Soundwave»

To all this content we must add what will be his first live broadcast. This, which will take place on May 8it will be the world race «Wings for Life«. This race, suitable for everyone, will have us racing against the so-called “Cacher Car”, and all proceeds from the entry will go towards research on the spinal cord and finding a cure for the injuries associated with it. In the words of Tom BurrowsDAZN EVP of Rights:

DAZN is quickly becoming a true entertainment space that brings together the most innovative and engaging sports in the world. Red Bull has a long history of producing exciting live events and compelling sports stories that capture the attention of fans around the world. We are very pleased to bring Red Bull TV and its programming to DAZN on a global scale.

Thanks to the arrival of Red Bull TV on DAZN, the platform manages to give even more variety to its content. This allows all its viewers to have access to the best sport and, in turn, to the greatest variety of it. If you have any questions about DAZN or the arrival of this channel to its offer, we remind you that you can contact its customer service.
